lead_paragraph: Janica Kostelic of Croatia, a four-time Olympic gold medalist, will not defend her World Cup overall title because of chronic back and knee pain. Kostelic, 24, said yesterday that she would “pause for a year and then see what will happen.”.
snippet: Janica Kostelic of Croatia, a four-time Olympic gold medalist, will not defend her World Cup overall title because of chronic back and knee pain. Kostelic, 24, said yesterday that she would “pause for a year and then see what will happen.”.
